segments.text: Do you have a family tradition at Christmas time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have so Ay ! But my favorite happens at Christmas Eve .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , all the brothers and sisters get together and fill the Christmas stockings for the litt 1e kids .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in fact it's fun for us to just be together that night and do this one thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess the spirit of it is what really makes any tradition fun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should be there some Christmas Eve .
segments.speaker: S2
